mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sentence_info WHERE user_id=#{userId} and sentence_id=#{sentenceId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sentence_info(userId,sentenceId,accuracyScore,fluencyScore,integrityScore,totalScore,count) VALUES (#{userId},#{sentenceId},#{accuracyScore},#{fluencyScore},#{integrityScore},#{totalScore},1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE accuracy_score=#{accuracyScore},fluency_score=#{fluencyScore},integrity_score=#{integrityScore},total_score,count=count+1
mapper.update: UPDATE sentence_info SET sentence_id = #{sentenceId}, accuracy_score = #{accuracyScore}, fluency_score = #{fluencyScore}, integrity_score = #{integrityScore}, total_score = #{totalScore} WHERE user_id=#{userId} and sentence_id=#{sentenceId}
mapper.delete: DELETE from sentence_info where user_id=#{userId} and sentence_id=#{sentenceId}
